snippet: The Vatican is suggesting that Archbishop Carlo Maria Viganò, the envoy to the United States, initiated papal face time for the Kentucky clerk.
abstract: Carlo Maria Vigano, papal nuncio to United States, is reported to have been responsible for brief meeting between Francis and Kentucky clerk Kim Davis; meeting, which generated strong positive and negative response, leaves some in church wondering if Archbishop should resign his post.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican is suggesting that Archbishop Carlo Maria Viganò, the envoy to the United States, initiated papal face time for the Kentucky clerk.

headline.main: Archbishop at Center of Mystery of Papal Meeting With Kim Davis
headline.print_headline: The Vatican Envoy at the Center of a Papal Whodunit

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
